  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 371x18
          text run at (0,0) width 371: "This page should have one square green block and no red."
layer at (8,50) size 80x80
  LayoutBlockFlow (positioned) {DIV} at (8,50) size 80x80 [bgcolor=#FF0000]

  LayoutBlockFlow (positioned) {DIV} at (8,50) size 80x80 [bgcolor=#008000]
    LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (40,80) size 0x0 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
